creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
text:
It would be fairly straightforward to make jspc compile the java that is 
produced by the translation of jsp to java. The largest impact would be to 
provide commandline options to control the java compiler.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
JspC included in Jasper 2 (from CVS HEAD) now does that. This behavior may have
been caused by another bug.
